title: Serif font used in Polish book, 2005
content:
In a second-hand bookshop I recently came across a book published in Poland in 2005, and bought it mainly because I was attracted to the typeface—which I still haven’t been able to identify. Any offers?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905211918im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/polish_5665.jpg)

 [‹ GlaxoSmithKline font ID please](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905211918/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47010 "Go to previous forum topic") [Angled Slab-Serif - Any ideas? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905211918/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47090 "Go to next forum topic")
author: George Tulloch

comments.content: Ah, I should have got that... Thanks Florian!
